translation.en: [Guillermo del Toro] A great movie…
will take you places you could not imagine.
translation.ko: 상상도 못 하는 곳으로 우리를 데려다줍니다

translation.en: And if it happens at a temple,
a building dedicated to it,
the experience is transcendental.
Opera has palaces,
the ballet has palaces,
painting has museums.
Cinema deserves that magical realm,
which was the great movie palaces.
Like any other holy building,
you go to a theater
to recapture a spiritual moment.
[del Toro] We're storytelling animals.
Every notion we have,
notion of love,
country, belonging,
they come from a story.
And the only art that can encompass any human experience is cinema.
translation.ko: 인간의 어떤 경험이라도 다 아우를 수 있는 유일한 예술은 영화뿐이고요

translation.en: When we can experience a movie in the environment that you can surrender yourself,
translation.ko: 자신을 내려놓을 수 있는 환경에서 영화를 경험할 수 있다면

translation.en: it engulfs you,
heals, elevates,
connects with your soul.
So, for me, the Egyptian is a temple.
Many times I've been at the bottom.
I'm about to quit the job…
translation.ko: 모든 게 부질없어서 일생의 직업을 그만둘 참이었죠

translation.en: [chuckles] …of life, and I go, "This is meaningless."
translation.ko: 모든 게 부질없어서 일생의 직업을 그만둘 참이었죠 "기예르모 델토로 감독"

translation.en: And cinema has lifted me up.
With the right drama, the right horror movie,
the right cartoon.
Can be a Capra.
Merry Christmas!
[del Toro] Can be a Keaton.
And it just shakes you.
Come on!
[Autumn Arkapaw] Raging Bull.
Thin Red Line…
…Road to Perdition.
Those are the movies that stick with me the most.
translation.ko: 제 뇌리에 콱 박힌 영화는 그런 것들이에요

translation.en: It feels so real to me,
like I feel like I'm now in this magical world.
translation.ko: 마법의 세계에 들어와 있는 기분이 들죠 "오텀 두럴드 아커포 촬영감독"

translation.en: That's actually happening.
The experience of going into the dark with strangers
and having this group hallucination,
and coming out the other end of it a different person.
It is a group experience,
and it gives you permission to feel it.
translation.ko: "리넷 하월 테일러 제작자" 그걸 느껴도 된다고 허락해 주죠

translation.en: [Arkapaw] The theater itself, the space at which your film is shown,
translation.ko: 관람하는 영화가 상영되는 극장 공간 그 자체가

translation.en: all feeds into how people are relating to your film.
translation.ko: 그 모든 것이 관객이 영화에 공감하는 데 영향을 줘요

translation.en: With the Egyptian, you go in there, and it's like, "Game on."
[Johnson] The whole experience is the show,
including walking up to the facade of the theater,
taking you back to the imagined glamour of Hollywood past.
translation.ko: 할리우드의 화려한 과거라는 상상 속으로 데려가 주죠

translation.en: [del Toro] It's a grand outing to a different reality.
You are transported to a place that has,
if not great architecture by the historical accuracy,
translation.ko: 역사적인 고증을 거쳐 지은 위대한 건축물은 아니라도

translation.en: certainly grand architecture.
[Arkapaw] The bravado of the theater is felt.
You're engulfed in that whole environment.
translation.ko: 관객은 이 공간 전체의 기운에 휩싸이죠

translation.en: As a person who completely believes in spirits and ghosts
translation.ko: 영혼과 유령이 존재하고 공간에 에너지가 담겨있다고

translation.en: and energy contained within spaces,
it's like those buildings have memory.
translation.ko: 그런 건물들은 기억을 가진 것만 같아요

translation.en: [Pete Hammond] My father was actually there
on the opening night of the Egyptian Theatre.
translation.ko: 이집션 시어터가 문을 연 날 거기 계셨어요 "피트 해먼드 영화 평론가"

translation.en: It was Robin Hood.
And he said, "I saw Douglas Fairbanks."
It was a big night. It was a very special thing.
[Leonard Maltin] I fell in love with it.
It became my favorite place in Hollywood to see a movie.
translation.ko: 할리우드에서 영화 볼 때 최애 극장이 되었죠 "레너드 몰틴 영화사학자"

translation.en: [Rene Lagler] I would tear 1,316 tickets every night.
It was fun.
translation.ko: 재밌었어요 그 모든 일에 참여하는 게 신났죠

translation.en: It was exciting to be a part of all that, especially the premieres.
translation.ko: 재밌었어요 그 모든 일에 참여하는 게 신났죠 "르네 라글러 이집션 전 안내원" 시사회는 특히 그랬고요

translation.en: The red carpet, the flowers.
Most of the stars,
Marlon Brando, and all those people, they would come to the theater.
translation.ko: 말론 브란도를 비롯해 모두가 극장에 오곤 했죠

translation.en: We were proud to be a part of something that was special.
translation.ko: 우린 특별한 일에 참여하게 돼서 뿌듯했어요

translation.en: [announcer] Ben-Hur, opening at the Egyptian Theatre.
It's already proclaimed as the entertainment experience of a lifetime.
translation.ko: 일생일대의 엔터테인먼트 경험으로 일찌감치 선포된 영화죠

translation.en: [man] There were lots of great premieres that happened there in the '60s…
How do you do?
…and the '70s, like Alien…
…the early '80s.
[Peyton Hall] I drove by the Egyptian.
The building had big holes.
I think that we need to keep the Egyptian forever.
This is such a fundamentally important place
translation.ko: 근본적인 의미에서 중요한 곳이에요 "페이튼 홀 복원 건축가"

translation.en: in the invention of how we experience movies.
translation.ko: 우리가 영화를 경험하는 방식이 발명된 곳이니까요

translation.en: The American Cinematheque courageously went forward on the rehab project
translation.ko: 아메리칸 시네마테크는 용감하게 재건 사업을 밀고 나가

translation.en: to save the history and character of the Egyptian Theatre
and to make it work again.
[del Toro] The first time I experienced King Kong was on a TV.
Many of my generation, and generations subsequent to mine,
translation.ko: 제 세대와 다음 세대의 많은 사람이

translation.en: have experienced most of their audiovisual storytelling on TV.
When I experienced Vertigo on the big screen,
I realized I had never seen it.
translation.ko: 이 영화를 본 적 없는 거나 마찬가지란 걸 깨달았어요

translation.en: Even though I had seen it many times before,
the size of the screen, that's one of the most important things.
translation.ko: 스크린 크기는 영화에서 손꼽히게 중요한 것이에요

translation.en: In any temple, surrender is key.
translation.ko: 어떤 극장에 가든 온전한 몰입이 핵심이에요

translation.en: At a moment's notice, your world changes.
translation.ko: 순식간에 세상이 바뀐 걸 알게 되죠

translation.en: [Arkapaw] I love Apocalypse Now.
I can always go back to a theater and watch that.
translation.ko: 언제든 극장에 다시 가서 그 영화를 볼 수 있어요

translation.en: I was just being so affected in a theater by these kind of epic films.
translation.ko: 극장에서 이런 장대한 영화를 보면 늘 큰 감동을 느껴요

translation.en: We have a sinner with us here.
[Arkapaw] Seeing There Will Be Blood and going, "I wanna do that."
translation.ko: '데어 윌 비 블러드'를 보면서 이랬어요, '저거 하고 싶다'

translation.en: That film was amazing.
That's why I became a DP.
I'm always thinking about,
"Will people love to see this in a theater?"
[Ben Tucker] I remember my first black-and-white movie,
which was Miracle on 34th Street,
and learning that I liked old movies too.
translation.ko: "벤 터커 수석 영사 기사" 그걸 보고 제가 옛날 영화도 좋아한다는 걸 알았어요

translation.en: I get it now, more than ever,
translation.ko: 지금은 그 어느 때보다 잘 이해해요

translation.en: how great it is to watch a movie with a really good audience
translation.ko: 정말 좋은 관객들과 함께 꽉 찬 극장에서 영화를 보는 게

translation.en: in a packed house.
What's special about the Egyptian is its ability to run nitrate-based film,
translation.ko: 이집션의 특별한 점은 질산염 필름을 상영할 수 있다는 거예요

translation.en: which is very unusual.
There's only a handful of theaters in the United States
translation.ko: 질산염 필름을 상영할 수 있는 극장은

translation.en: and in the world that can run nitrate film.
translation.ko: 질산염 필름을 상영할 수 있는 극장은 미국과 전 세계를 통틀어 몇 안 됩니다

translation.en: Movies are as delicate as vampires. They need darkness to exist,
translation.ko: 영화는 뱀파이어처럼 섬세해요 어둠이 있어야 존재할 수 있고

translation.en: and they are dependent on a very, very strange body chemistry.
translation.ko: 아주아주 이상한 신체 화학 반응에 의존해요

translation.en: [Arkanaw] I always like the OG, kind of unique film print projection
translation.ko: 진기한 필름 프린트로 영사하는 원조 영화를 처음부터 좋아했어요

translation.en: because I like texture, and I like imperfection.
There's something about it that feels more special.
[del Toro] The experience is different.
There is something beautiful about the flickering.
translation.ko: 그 깜박이는 빛에는 뭔가 아름다운 구석이 있어요

translation.en: We're trusted by the studios, and the archives, with their best prints.
translation.ko: 우리 시네마테크는 스튜디오의 위탁을 받아 기록 보관소에 최상의 프린트를 보관하고 있습니다

translation.en: You're looking at prints that are closer in generation
translation.ko: 여러분은 원본 네거티브와 세대적으로 더 가까운 프린트를

translation.en: to the original negative.
[Johnson] We should be championing places that are showing great older films,
translation.ko: 훌륭한 옛 영화를 상영하는 곳들을 싸워서 지켜야 해요

translation.en: because it's a incredibly vital experience that changes people's lives.
translation.ko: 그건 사람들의 삶을 바꾸는 엄청나게 중요한 경험이니까요

translation.en: [del Toro] I remember seeing Los Olvidados, Buñuel's movie.
translation.ko: 부뉴엘 감독의 영화 '잊혀진 사람들'을 본 게 기억나요

translation.en: And I came out completely transmogrified.
translation.ko: 극장을 나올 때는 완전히 다른 사람이 되어있었죠

translation.en: I thought, "That was done by a filmmaker in Mexico."
"I can talk about my reality in my mind or my place of birth through cinema."
translation.ko: '내 머릿속이나 출생지의 현실을 영화를 통해 이야기할 수 있구나'

translation.en: [Johnson] I remember going to a theater and seeing Harold Lloyd's The Freshman.
To see this film from 80 years in the past
bring the house down…
That's probably the best experience I've ever had in a theater watching a comedy.
translation.ko: 극장에서 코미디 영화를 본 것 중 최고의 경험이었을 거예요

translation.en: [del Toro] Peter Bogdanovich used to say there are no old movies and new movies.
translation.ko: 피터 보그다노비치는 영화에 옛것과 새것은 없다고 했어요

translation.en: Just movies you've seen and movies you haven't seen.
translation.ko: 본 영화와 아직 안 본 영화만 있을 뿐이라면서요

translation.en: And for me, to be moved by Mervyn LeRoy…
translation.ko: 전 이런 영화들에 감동받았어요 머빈 리로이의 작품…

translation.en: The bigger they come, the harder they fall.
translation.ko: 큰 인물일수록 추락할 때 충격도 큰 법이야

translation.en: -[del Toro] …by Douglas Sirk… -Put down that phone.
Would you like to speak to him yourself? I'll tell him you're here.
translation.ko: 직접 얘기하겠어요? 당신이 여기 있다고 말할게요

translation.en: …they had to wait for me.
Any way we can preserve those experiences,
the way they wanted it to be screened, it's a sacred duty.
translation.ko: 감독들이 바랐던 대로 상영하는 방식을 지키는 건 신성한 의무입니다

translation.en: [Hammond] The Egyptian needs serious remodeling,
translation.ko: "아메리칸 시네마테크" 이집션은 상당한 개조가 필요한데 지금 그렇게 하고 있어요

translation.en: and it's getting it,
translation.ko: 이집션은 상당한 개조가 필요한데 지금 그렇게 하고 있어요

translation.en: and that's thanks to some of the money from Netflix and American Cinematheque.
translation.ko: 넷플릭스와 아메리칸 시네마테크가 비용 일부를 댄 덕분이죠

translation.en: At the Egyptian, we are working on a very good recreation and preservation
of what was there in 1922,
so that the Egyptian is there for people to come and have this experience.
translation.ko: 사람들이 찾아와 경험할 수 있는 이집션이 되게 하려고요

translation.en: One, please.
[del Toro] Certainly, in cinema, there are screening rooms that are cold,
and there are screening rooms that are warm.
Those are the best places to see a movie.
If it's a great movie, it's great.
If it's a bad movie, it's not that bad.
translation.ko: 나쁜 영화를 보더라도 그렇게 나쁘지는 않고요

translation.en: The Egyptian, even though it's enormous,
it's a really warm room.
[Taylor] There is a magic to the Egyptian.
Feeling all of these incredible filmmakers that came before you.
translation.ko: 먼저 왔던 대단한 감독들의 자취가 모두 느껴지는 곳이죠

translation.en: That history gets passed down, inspires a new generation.
translation.ko: 그 역사는 계승되어 새로운 세대에게 영감을 줘요

translation.en: You can still go to the Egyptian
and still see some of the movies that played there decades before.
translation.ko: 수십 년 전에 상영됐던 영화를 볼 수 있어요

translation.en: [del Toro] There's a covenant with cinema at the Egyptian
that you get renewed every time you're there as an audience member.
translation.ko: 관객으로서 거기에 갈 때마다 새 기운을 얻게 된다는 약속요

translation.en: And as a filmmaker, you feel that covenant with the audience.
You have a direct line with the origins of cinema at its most grand.
translation.ko: 가장 성대했던 영화의 기원과 직접적으로 연결되는 거예요

translation.en: The Egyptian is there to have a spiritual moment with film.
translation.ko: 이집션에 가면 영화로 영적인 순간을 체험하게 됩니다
